TopicTitle: Does RCS & Vernor work inside a fairing?

Articles.Content:
Hey,

Does RCS & Vernor work inside a fairing? I cant seem to be able to fit RCS or Vernor on the top of a rocket with a fairing anymore?

Be well

/J

in general, you can't modify stuff once you've placed a fairing over it.

you need to reset the fairing, place your rcs/vernor nodes, then re-do the fairing.
Yes, but does the RCS work inside the fairing? Because you cant place it on the outside.
RCS doesn't appear to care about being obstruction, so they should work fine. I don't know about vernors, but I would anticipate they have the same behavior.
